name: Mercure Sydney Parramatta

reviews.text: Stayed with a sporting team for 3 nights. Room had 2 queen beds but still enough space to not be tripping over each other. The exhaust fan in bathroom did not work so large mirror was of no use after showering.
reviews.title: "A" plus staff
Out of towner stay
reviews.text: Overall the hotel and room was above average. The location of the hotel was a bit out of the way from civilization. However, the staff were very friendly and happy to help an 'out-of-towner' out, pointing us in the right direction.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My partner and myself were not too happy with the buffet breakfast. Not much choice for the price. However, the food on the 24 hour room service was quite good.
reviews.title: RELAXING AND QUIET ACCOMODATION

reviews.text: The motel was central to where we needed to be - Everything we needed right near us and staff and amenities were great.
reviews.title: Lovely Stay

reviews.text: Desk staff very helpful and polite. Disabled room was adequate but only has a shower chair. Adjoining room has access door for carer. Footpath outside was very cambered on where it crossed the car park driveway and you could easily take a tumble. Entry to carpark is very tight but carpark has several disabled parks. Rosehill racecourse only 100 metres away. Next door is bowling club which has a very cheap all you cab eat area. Many clubs within walking or short drive distance. Bus with access right outside to railway station which is also accessable. Ferry terminal also accessable and nice trip to circular quay or darling harbour. Sydney very whell signposted for wheelchairs.
reviews.title: Good location
great
reviews.text: the room was good size and clean the only thing was the beer in the mini bar was not fresh it tasted like it had been cold then room temp then gold again and didnt have a nice taste

reviews.title: Sydney Suburban Saturday
reviews.text: Chose this hotel for proximity to location of function and because previous stays were good.This aty was quite good with hotel services good and room updated and clean and functional.The parking area is still limited and hard to access but otherwise a good place to stay.

description: Mercure Sydney Parramatta offers spacious and contemporary 4 star accommodation on the fringe of Parramatta CBD. Attending an event? We are in prime position opposite Rosehill Gardens, a 10 minute drive from Sydney Olympic Park and only a short distance to Parramatta City Raceway and Eastern Creek. Mercure Parramatta is the perfect place to relax with our welcoming M Restaurant and Bar open 7 days. With suites and interconnecting rooms why not bring the kids along they will love the use of our Pool, spa and tennis courts on site. So what are you waiting for?
